description: Itsuki`s younger sister and Yuzuki`s step sister, who is a year older than her. She is quite fond of her older brother, and is irritated by Yuzuki, saying that she acts nice just for attention. She has also been known to tell lies in order to make Yuzuki upset. She seems to mischievous and loves to cause trouble. She shows a slight interest in Haruto. After the one year time-skip, she and Yuzuki have grown closer. She tries, and succeeds, in getting Haruto to realize his lingering feelings for Yuzuki while he was still dating Asuka.
name: Eba Rin
